articles.author: Khushi Pal
articles.title: 10 must-see dreamy ‘Images of the Day’ by NASA - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Let’s take a look at 10 stunning ‘Image of the Day’ shared by NASA.
articles.content:
By Khushi PalPublished May 08, 2024
Hindustan TimesIn FocusPhoto Credits: NASA

articles.author: CGTN
articles.title: Chang'e-6 enters lunar orbit after near-moon braking - CGTN
articles.description: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe has successfully entered its circumlunar orbit after performing a near-moon braking procedure, the China National Space Administration said on Wednesday.
articles.content: By continuing to browse our site you agree to our use of cookies, revised Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. You can change your cookie settings through your browser.

articles.author: Stephanie Pappas
articles.title: Epic NASA video takes you to the heart of a black hole — and destroys you in seconds - Livescience.com
articles.description: What would it be like to fall past the event horizon of a black hole? A new NASA simulation provides a peek into the bizarre physics of spaghettification.
articles.content:
Ever wondered what it would be like to fall into a black hole
? A new NASA simulation has the answer — including the inevitable, crushing end. 
Researchers created the new simulation using the Disc… [+3453 chars]

articles.title: Massive 'God's hand' captured in Dark Energy Camera, it's eight light-years long - WION
articles.description: The Dark Energy Camera (DECam) has captured what scientists are calling a massive  'God's hand', reaching out for a distant galaxy, named ESO 257-19 (PGC 21338). The  massive formation is located 1,300 light-years from Earth within our Milky Way galaxy and is…

articles.title: Here's why a rich guy going to space for a second time actually matters - Ars Technica
articles.description: Polaris Dawn will be the first time that SpaceX employees have actually gone to space.
articles.content:

articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.title: NASA ALERT! Two Big Asteroids Set To Come Extremely Close To Earth: Check Distance, Speed And Time - Times Now
articles.description: NASA issues alert on two approaching asteroids, 2024 JR1 and 2024 JO2, detailing their size, speed, and close proximity to Earth.

articles.title: This is why Venus is bone dry - BBC.com
articles.description: Venus once had oceans of water but today, it's bone-dry. Now, researchers know why.
articles.content:
The Earth and Venus are made of similar material and are about the same size. Yet one planet has an abundance of water and the other is dry. When and how did this happen?
Researchers at the Universi… [+218 chars]

articles.author: Keith Cooper
articles.title: Spacecraft captures absolutely incredible video of plasma swirling on the sun - Space.com
articles.description: The Solar Orbiter spacecraft captured outbursts, jets and rivers of plasma beneath the arch of a glowing coronal loop.
articles.content:
Underneath the arch of a huge coronal loop
, a wealth of exotic solar phenomena active in the transition zone between the sun's lower atmosphere
, the chromosphere, and the corona, have been record… [+5271 chars]
